summary: Contoso Wireless offers a variety of upgrade services, including product streaming services which allow customers to stream music and video content directly to their device. Other services include free Wi-Fi hotspots, unlimited data plans, and discounted rates on international calls. Plus, all services come with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Currently, there is a promotion going on where customers who sign up for the product streaming service will get 3 months of free access to all of their content, and an additional 6 months free if they sign up for an annual subscription.
